title: Implement Parallel Story Executor
description: Create a parallel story executor that can run multiple stories simultaneously across different agents. Respects domain boundaries, manages worktrees, coordinates signals, and merges results. This is the core multi-agent orchestration capability.

objective.i_want: to execute multiple stories in parallel across agents
objective.so_that: development velocity increases 4x with 4 agents working simultaneously

acceptance_criteria.description: Multiple stories can be started simultaneously
acceptance_criteria.ears_format: WHEN 4 non-conflicting stories queued THEN all 4 start within 5 seconds
acceptance_criteria.test_approach: Queue 4 stories to different domains, measure startup times

acceptance_criteria.description: Each story runs in isolated worktree
acceptance_criteria.ears_format: WHEN story starts THEN it executes in dedicated worktree
acceptance_criteria.test_approach: Start 4 stories, verify each has unique worktree

acceptance_criteria.description: Signals from all agents processed correctly
acceptance_criteria.ears_format: WHEN multiple agents publish signals THEN orchestrator handles all without loss
acceptance_criteria.test_approach: 4 agents send signals simultaneously, verify all received

acceptance_criteria.description: Domain conflicts prevented at queue time
acceptance_criteria.ears_format: WHEN 2 stories target same domain THEN second story waits for first to complete
acceptance_criteria.test_approach: Queue 2 AUTH stories, verify serialized execution

acceptance_criteria.description: Completed stories merge to main without conflicts
acceptance_criteria.ears_format: WHEN all parallel stories complete THEN changes merge cleanly to main
acceptance_criteria.test_approach: Complete 4 stories, verify main branch has all changes

acceptance_criteria.description: Single agent failure does not affect others
acceptance_criteria.ears_format: WHEN one agent fails THEN other agents continue execution
acceptance_criteria.test_approach: Force one agent to fail, verify others complete

acceptance_criteria.ears_format: WHEN parallel execution completes THEN token usage tracked per agent and story
acceptance_criteria.test_approach: Complete parallel run, query metrics by agent

reuse_patterns.work_stealing: Load balance stories across available agents
reuse_patterns.barrier_sync: Wait for all parallel stories before merge phase

test_categories.name: Parallel Execution
examples: should isolate each story in worktree

test_categories.name: Merge Coordination
examples: should merge all branches after completion
should handle merge in correct order

test_categories.name: Fault Tolerance
examples: should continue if one agent fails

mocking_strategy.git: Real git operations in temp repository

safety.rollback_plan: Cancel all parallel executions, revert to sequential mode

notes: This is the culmination of Phase 3 - true multi-agent parallel execution. Start with 2 agents, then scale to 4. Monitor resource usage carefully.
